other_title: ドラゴンボール超（スーパー） (Japanese)
plot: After defeating Majin Buu, life is peaceful once again. Ordered by Chi-chi to earn money, Goku works even as he wants to train even more. Meanwhile, Goten, about to become a brother-in-law to Videl, sets out on a journey with Trunks to find her a present.
opening_theme: "Chōzetsu Dynamic!" (超絶☆ダイナミック!; Excellent Dynamic!) by Kazuya Yoshii (eps 1-76)
"Genkai Toppa × Survivor" (限界突破×サバイバー) by Kiyoshi Hikawa (eps 77-131)
ending_theme: "Hello Hello Hello" (ハローハローハロー) by Good Morning America (eps 1-12)
"Starring Star" (スターリングスター) by KEYTALK (eps 13-25)
"Usubeni" (薄紅; Light Pink) by LACCO TOWER (eps 26-36)
"Yoka Yoka Dance" (よかよかダンス Yoka Yoka Dansu) by BATTEN SHOW JO TAI (eps 50-59)
"Aku no Tenshi to Seigi no Akuma" (悪の天使と正義の悪魔; Evil Angel and Devil of Justice) by THE COLLECTORS (eps 73-83)
insert_song: "Kyūkyoku no Battle" (究極の聖戦) by Akira Kushida (eps 110,116,131)
"Waiwai World" (ワイワイワールド) by Ado Mizumori (ep 69)
